sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_entry_b63b7788d3875110b0af46c7c00851cd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>reject</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Stratagem Link Transform">09fa6b84d3475110b0af46c7c008512d</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	
	var output = "";
	var unit = "";
	
	//Get unit record
	var uGr = new GlideRecord("x_903540_40k_arm_0_units");
	uGr.addQuery("id",source.u_ï__datasheet_id);
	uGr.query();

	while (uGr.next()) {
		output = uGr.sys_id;
	}
	

	//Get current stratagem available fors
	var gr = new GlideRecord("x_903540_40k_arm_0_stratagems");
	gr.addQuery("id",source.u_stratagem_id);
	gr.query();
	
	while(gr.next()) {
		if (gr.available_for) {
			output += "," + gr.available_for;
		}
	}

	// Add your code here
	return output; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_903540_40k_arm_0_ihub_import_956a6384d3475110b0af46c7c00851e9</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-04 13:20:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>b63b7788d3875110b0af46c7c00851cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="40k Army Builder" source="x_903540_40k_arm_0">11fc11c7d3225110b0af46c7c008518e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="40k Army Builder">11fc11c7d3225110b0af46c7c008518e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_b63b7788d3875110b0af46c7c00851cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-04 13:46:29</sys_updated_on><target_field>available_for</target_field><target_table>x_903540_40k_arm_0_stratagems</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
